abstract: University of North Carolina men's lacrosse team defeats University of Maryland, 14-13, to win NCAA Division I championship.
lead_paragraph: Down two goals with five minutes left, the Tar Heels, who were unseeded entering the tournament, tied the score in regulation and won the match in overtime on a man-up goal by Chris Cloutier.

headline.main: North Carolina Battles Back Against Maryland to Secure Lacrosse Title
headline.content_kicker: North Carolina 14, Maryland 13 | Division I championship
headline.print_headline: With a Late Rally, North Carolina Wins Its First N.C.A.A. Title in 25 Years
headline.kicker: North Carolina 14, Maryland 13 | Division I championship

snippet: Down two goals with five minutes left, the Tar Heels, who were unseeded entering the tournament, tied the score in regulation and won the match in overtime on a man-up goal by Chris Cloutier.
